title: i cant play lol
body: i downloaded lol and i have leagcy client sowed up then i clicked launch and nothing happens whats hapening and how can i resolve this?

replies.body: Your pc might not be letting League launch because it doesn't recognize the new client. Let's double check you [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) really quick, but hit me back if that doesn't get you in!
